code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./styles/home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const[companies,setCompanies]=useState([{name:'BANQUE LCL',status:'Pending'},{name:'BNP PARIBAS',status:'Downloaded'},{name:'CREDIT MUTUEL',status:'Pending'}]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Customer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"company-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"company-search",children:"Search for a company"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"company-search",placeholder:"Company"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"create-company-btn",children:"Create new company"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"company-table",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Company name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:companies.map((company,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:company.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[company.status,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"status-btn",children:company.status==='Downloaded'?'✔':'✖'})]})]},index))})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"download-btn",children:"Download the documents"})]});};export default Home;
